get.description: Gets a coupon with its associated skus, zones, and store overrides.

post.description: Get total price for a cart by sku

get.description: Get coupons for an item at a specified store numbers
Get current item price by item number
Get current item price by item and store numbers
get.summary: Current Price by SKU and Store

post.description: Get current price for multiple items at a single store

get.description:
Get base item price by item number, store number, and effective date.
Base price does not include zone specials, store specials, or coupons.
(Note: Previous prices are not fully supported)
get.summary: Retail Price by SKU - Store - Date

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: Format - int32. The sku for the item

parameters.name: storeNumber
parameters.description: Format - int32. Get the base pricing for this store

parameters.name: effectiveDate
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Get the base price in effect for this date

get.description:
Get the highest ranking price (ie A store item special is higher than a store item regeular)
(Note: Previous prices are not fully supported)

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: Format - int32. The sku for the item

parameters.name: storeNumber
parameters.description: Format - int32. The price at this store

parameters.name: effectiveDate
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). The price is in effect for this date

get.description: Get future item price by SKU

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: Format - int32. Sku of the item.

get.description: Get previous day's item price by item number
Get previous day's item price by item and store numbers
get.summary: Previous Price by SKU and Store

get.description: Get future item price by item and store numbers
get.summary: Future Price by SKU and Store

get.description: Get the price family by item number

Get the price components (ie regular price and special price)
(Note: Previous prices are not fully supported)
get.summary: Price Levels by SKU and Store

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: Format - int32. The sku for the item

parameters.name: storeNumber
parameters.description: Format - int32. The price at this store

get.description: Get current item price by item number
Get current item price by item and store numbers
get.summary: Published Current Price by SKU and Store

post.description: Get current price for multiple items at a single store
post.summary: Published Current Price by SKUs Store

get.description: Get future item price by SKU

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: Format - int32. Sku of the item.

get.description: Get future item price by item and store numbers
get.summary: Published Future Price by SKU and Store

get.description: Get prior item price by item number
Get prior item price by item and store numbers
get.summary: Prior Price by SKU and Store

get.description:
Get base item price by item number and effective date.
Base price does not include zone specials, store specials, or coupons.
(Note: Previous prices are not fully supported)

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: Format - int32. The sku for the item

parameters.name: effectiveDate
parameters.description: Format - date-time (as date-time in RFC3339). Get the base price in effect for this date

get.description: Get point of sale indicators by item and state abbreviation
get.summary: Point of Sale Indicators by SKU and State

get.description: Get a list of all future cancelled coupons
Get point of sale indicators by item
get.summary: Point of Sale Indicators by SKU

get.description: Get coupons for an item
Get the zone prices

parameters.name: sku
parameters.description: Format - int32. The sku for the item

CouponHeader.description: Represents a coupon and its master attributes.

IsQuantityEnforced.description: Indicator of a required quantity for a coupon.

MaxRedemptions.description: Maximum times a coupon can be applied.

MinQuantity.description: Minimum number of items in a cart needed for a coupon.

IsCardRequired.description: Indicator for a loyalty card being required for a coupon.

Description.description:
A brief description of the promotion.
Not currently supported

DigitalOfferId.description: Id from the digital discount system.

RedemptionChargeAmount.description: Amount to redeem from the vendor

SupplierCopay.description: The amount the supplier is sponsoring

IsMinimumSaleRequired.description: Is the customer basket have to be a minimum amount

MinimumRequiredSaleAmount.description: If required, the minimum basket sale amount

Items.description: A collection of items associated with this coupon.

Zones.description: A collection of zone-specific information associated with this coupon.

StoreOverrides.description: A collection of store-specific information associated with this coupon.

VendorAllowanceBasisCode.description:
Indicates the type of coupon that the vendor copay is based on (the portion of the coupon that the vendor pays for).
Possible values:
A (Amount)
G (Gift)
W (Weighted)
R (Random Weight)

CouponItem.description: Represents an item associated with a CouponHeader.

Department.description: The department to which the item belongs.

Category.description: The category to which the item belongs.

Class.description: The class to which the item belongs.

CouponZone.description: Repesents zone-specific coupon information associated with a CouponHeader.

ZoneNumber.description: The Zone number which identifies the zone.

CouponValue.description: The value of the coupon at this store.

BuyQuantity.description: The quantity of the item the customer needs to buy.

GetQuantity.description: The quantity of the item the customer will receive.

MinQuantity.description: Minimum number of items in a cart needed for the coupon.

CouponStoreOverride.description: Represents a store override information associated with a CouponHeader.

StoreNumber.description: The Store number which identifies the store.

CouponValue.description: The value of the coupon at this store.

BuyQuantity.description: The quantity of the item the customer needs to buy.

GetQuantity.description: The quantity of the item the customer will receive.

MinQuantity.description: Minimum number of items in a cart needed for the coupon.

CartRequest.description: Initial input resource for a shopping cart

LineItems.description: List of line items contained in the cart

CouponCodes.description: List of coupons for the cart

StoreNumber.description: The store number for the cart

LoyaltyNumber.description: The loyalty card number for the cart

Sku.description: The Item Number (SKU) of an item

Quantity.description: The quantity of the item to be purchased

MeasuredWeight.description: Actual weight when weighed on a scale

AverageWeight.description: The average weight for an item

CartTotal.description:
Return object when getting the total for a cart. This resource contains all the prices for items in a cart 
and the total of all items in the cart. A list of items for which prices could not be found 
will also be included.

LineItems.description: Prices for all items in a cart

Total.description: Total of all items in a cart

InvalidItems.description: List of all items which a price could not be found

LineItem.description: Object for returning line item calculations

Sku.description: The SKU for the receipt line item

Quantity.description: The quantity for the receipt line item

AverageWeight.description: The average weight for the receipt line item

Promotions.description: A list of all promotions for the receipt line item

Price.description:
The calculated price for the receipt line item
sometimes the price gets manipulated based on the retail family in the basket

LineItemPromotion.description: Container for promotions for receipt line items

Description.description:
A brief description of the promotion
Not currently supported

BuyQuantity.description: The buy amount for a BOGO promotion (ex: Buy 3 get 1 Free)

GetQuantity.description: The get amount for a BOGO promotion (ex: Buy 3 get 1 Free)

Value.description: The value of the coupon (based on CouponValueMode)

LineItemSalesPrice.description: Object representing a price to be returned from the webservice

Quantity.description: The number of items for the price

UnitQuantityDecimal.description: The package size with decimal scale

UnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure for the item. The package size UoM

UnitPrice.description: Calculated unit price of the item (ie shelf tag)

UnitPriceUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure used for the unit price calculation (ie shelf tag)

PriceStartDate.description: The effective start date of the price

PriceEndDate.description: The effective end date of the price

HasPromotion.description: Does the current price have a promotion

Conditions.description: Conditions the promotion if they exist

CouponCartMinimum.description: Minimum value of items in a cart needed for a coupon

CouponMinQuantity.description: Minimum number of items in a cart needed for a coupon

CouponMaxRedemptions.description: Maximum times a coupon can be applied

IsCouponQuantityEnforced.description: Indicator of a required quantity for a coupon

StoreNumber.description: The store where the coupon applies

Sku.description: The SKU that for the coupon

MaxRedemptions.description: Maximum times a coupon can be applied

CartMinimum.description: Minimum value of items in a cart needed for a coupon

MinQuantity.description: Minimum number of items in a cart needed for a coupon

Value.description: The value of the coupon (based on CouponValueMode)

BuyQuantity.description: The quantity the customer needs to buy

GetQuantity.description: The quantity the customer will receive

IsCardRequired.description: Indicator for a loyalty card being required for a coupon

SupplierCopay.description: The amount the supplier is sponsoring

Description.description:
A brief description of the promotion
Not currently supported

Source.description: Indicator of a ZONE or STORE coupon

DigitalOfferId.description: Id from the digital discount system

CouponNumber.description:
Coupon Number
Not currently supported on this resource

VendorAllowanceBasisCode.description:
Indicates the type of coupon that the vendor copay is based on (the portion of the coupon that the vendor pays for).
Possible values:
A (Amount)
G (Gift)
W (Weighted)
R (Random Weight)

CancelledCoupon.description: Relevant info for coupons that have been cancelled

CouponId.description: The ID of the cancelled coupon

StoreNumber.description: The store where the coupon applies

AdTypeCode.description: This code indicates the media for this ad to Adv./stores.

AdLayoutCode.description: This code brings items together that should be advertised together.

AdQualityCode.description: This code indicates the space the item should have in the ad.

AdMerchandisingTypeCode.description: This code tells stores how the product is intended to be displayed.

AdPreorderCode.description: This code indicates to the store if a pre-order is needed or allowed.

CurrentPrice.description: Object representing a price to be returned from the webservice

StoreNumber.description: The store where the price applies

LeadSku.description: The Lead SKU of the item

IsSoldByRandomWeight.description: Is the item sold by random weight or by "eaches"

PromotionalPrice.description: The price of an item with all potential promotions

PromotionalQuantity.description: The quantity applicable to the promotional price

PromotionStartDate.description: The effective start date of the promotion

PromotionEndDate.description: The effective end date of the promotion

HasDeposit.description: Identifies an item with a deposit

Quantity.description: The number of items for the price

UnitQuantityDecimal.description: The package size with decimal scale

UnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure for the item. The package size UoM

UnitPrice.description: Calculated unit price of the item (ie shelf tag)

UnitPriceUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure used for the unit price calculation (ie shelf tag)

UnitDisplay.description: String representation of the unit price (ie shelf tag)

PriceStartDate.description: The effective start date of the price

PriceEndDate.description: The effective end date of the price

PriceEffectiveDate.description: The effective date of the price; Important for consumers looking for emergency price changes

HasPromotion.description: Does the current price have a promotion

AmountChanged.description:
The ammount changed is the change in the unit price
Current we are only implementing this field for getting current price by sku

PriceLastUpdatedDate.description:
This is the last time the AmountChanged field was updated. (aka, the price changed)
This currently does not update for any start/end dates changing unless the price also changed
